sn40.7:4.4: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
sn40.7:4.6: So khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40.7:4.7: Tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40.7:5.1: Atha kho maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40.7:5.3: Mā, brāhmaṇa, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pamādo, ākiñcaññāyatane cittaṃ saṇṭhapehi, ākiñcaññāyatane cittaṃ ekodiṃ karohi, ākiñcaññāyatane cittaṃ samādahā’ti.
sn40.7:5.4: So khvāhaṃ, āvuso, aparena samayena sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihāsiṃ.
sn40.7:5.5: Yañhi taṃ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya … pe …
